TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AccessControlList extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

summary.span: 包含一个访问控制项列表，这些项为一个或多个受信者指定访问权限。

span.span: Contains a list of access control entries, specifying access rights for one or more trustees.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来指定多个受信者和访问权限设置权限时，将通过调用一次。Use the class to specify multiple trustees and access rights to add with a single call when setting permissions. 通过添加每个受信者和访问权限组合的访问控制项构造你访问控制列表。Construct your access control list by adding an access control entry for each trustee and access rights combination. A标识允许或拒绝对安全对象的访问的受信者。A identifies the trustees that are allowed or denied access to a securable object. 当进程试图访问可保护对象时，系统将检查以确定是否授予对其的访问的对象的访问控制列表中的访问控制项。When a process tries to access a securable object, the system checks the access control entries in the object's access control list to determine whether to grant access to it. 如果对象不具有访问控制列表，则系统将授予完全访问权限的所有内容。If the object does not have an access control list, the system grants full access to everything. 如果该对象的访问控制列表没有任何条目，则系统将拒绝所有访问的对象的尝试。If the object's access control list has no entries, the system denies all attempts to access the object. 直到它找到一个或多个允许所有请求的访问权限或任何请求的访问权限被拒绝，系统会按顺序检查的访问控制项。The system checks the access control entries in sequence until it finds one or more that allow all the requested access rights or until any of the requested access rights are denied. 系统将检查每个顺序，直到发生以下事件之一：The system examines each in sequence until one of the following events occurs: - 访问拒绝显式拒绝任何对一个线程的访问令牌中列出的受信者的请求的访问权限。An access-denied explicitly denies any of the requested access rights to one of the trustees listed in the thread's access token. - 一个或多个访问允许项的线程的访问令牌中显式列出的受信者授予所有请求的访问权限。One or more access-allowed items for trustees listed in the thread's access token explicitly grant all the requested access rights. - 所有已检查项，并且没有仍在至少一个请求的访问权限，没有已明确允许，在这种情况下，访问被隐式拒绝。All items have been checked and there is still at least one requested access right that has not been explicitly allowed, in which case, access is implicitly denied.

summary.span: 将整个访问控制列表复制到访问控制项的兼容的一维数组，并且从目标数组的指定索引开始。

span.span: Copies the entire access control list to a compatible one-dimensional array of access control entries, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The parameter is .
The parameter is less than zero.

exception.span: 参数大于或等于 参数的长度。

span.span: The number of elements in the source access control list is greater than the available space from to the end of the destination array of access control entries.

summary.span: 将访问控制项插入访问控制列表中的指定位置处。

span.span: Inserts an access control entry into the access control list at the specified position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`参数等于在访问控制列表中，项的数目，则将该项追加到末尾。If the `index` parameter equals the number of items in the access control list, then the entry is appended to the end. 否则，插入点之后的条目将下移以容纳列表中的新项。Otherwise, the entries after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new item in the list.

exception.span: 参数在此访问控制列表中不是有效索引。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid index in this access control list.
The parameter is .

span.span: The to remove from the access control list.

summary.span: 从访问控制列表移除特定访问控制项的第一个匹配项。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a specific access control entry from the access control list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请按照已移除的项的访问控制项上移以占据空出的位置。The access control entries that follow the removed item move up to occupy the vacated spot.

span.span: The parameter is .
